## ChartDataCell.R1C1Formula 属性

获取或设置 R1C1 风格的公式。

```csharp
public string R1C1Formula { get; set; }
```

### 示例

```csharp
[C#]
IChartDataCell cell = workbook.GetCell(0, "C2");
cell.R1C1Formula = "MAX(R2C6:R5C8) / 3";
```
